## Installation

Load in common libraries used by this package

```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

```


You might need to install 

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages()


```

Now, we install my R Package
```{r}
devtools::install_github("MicaelaP24/R_Package_Pineda")

```
```{r}
download.file()

```
